item.title: Amet - Flattening a Python dictionary as environment variables
item.description: I recently had to build an ETL job in Python that was initially going to be deployed on AWS. Little did I know that a last minute change from AWS to Heroku would cause me to change how the job’s configuration was going to be read significantly.
